page.title: 13Totton Police Station
page.content: Yesterday I went to Totton Police Station.A P.C. talked to us about his work. He joined the force as a cadet at 16 years old. It takes two years to train a cadet. He has been at Totton for seven years. There are not any very bad crimes in Totton. The worst ones are burglaries. Sometimes there are family upsets. He once caught a thief stealing milk from a dairy. It made him scared because he was alone & the other man was very big. He enjoys his job & chose it because it is an outdoor job, very interesting, & each day is different. We had our fingerprints taken, found out what it is like being locked in a cell & sat in a magistrates chair. We tried the police radio.
